memes.name: Precursor Memes
memes.desc: Various precursor artifacts of cultural significance, used to replicate their technology. For some reason, "furry purry creatures ruling stick figures" is a very common theme.

mosaic.name: Mosaic
mosaic.desc: A strange life-like material that can replicate itself.

azure_orb.name: Azure Orb
azure_orb.desc: Mystical object of precursor origin. Seems to affect energy fields.

scarlet_orb.name: Scarlet Orb
scarlet_orb.desc: Mystical object of precursor origin. Somehow produces very strong blasts of energy.

verdant_orb.name: Verdant Orb
verdant_orb.desc: Mystical object of precursor origin. Miraculously improves the functioning of anything complex.

amber_orb.name: Amber Orb
amber_orb.desc: Mystical object of precursor origin. Stabilizes energy flows.

pudding_factory.name: Pudding Factory
pudding_factory.desc: It's haunted! Produces food out of thin air.
